subtitle:
1
00:00:26,000 --> 00:00:33,000
Tâi-oân-jī kap Tâi-gí siaⁿ-ūn

2
00:00:33,000 --> 00:00:41,000
Hō-ló Tâi-gí bûn-jī-hòa ê ki-chhó͘ kang-têng

3
00:00:41,000 --> 00:00:49,000
Siáⁿ-mih sī Tâi-oân-jī?

4
00:00:49,000 --> 00:00:54,000
Tâi-oân-jī tiō-sī Tâi-oân Lô-má-jī

5
00:00:54,000 --> 00:01:06,000
Tâi-oân Lô-má-jī tiō-sī Pe̍h-ōe-jī, ia̍h-tiō-sī thoân-thóng ê Kàu-hōe Lô-má-jī

6
00:01:06,000 --> 00:01:17,000
Í-keng ū chi̍t-pah poeh-cha̍p nî ê le̍k-sú, tù-chok chhiau-kòe la̍k-pah pún í-siōng

7
00:01:17,000 --> 00:01:24,000
Tâi-oân-jī sī jī, mā ū piau-im kong-lêng

8
00:01:24,000 --> 00:01:33,000
Tâi-oân-jī ū su-ji̍p-hoat, ē-tàng tiān-náu siá-chok, chiūⁿ-bāng

9
00:01:33,000 --> 00:01:45,000
Hoan-gêng lâi o̍h Tâi-oân-jī, tha̍k Tâi-gí-bûn, siá Tâi-gí-bûn, kà Tâi-gí

10
00:01:45,000 --> 00:01:56,000
Chhiáⁿ seng hòng-khì lí ê koan-liām, khài-liām

11
00:01:56,000 --> 00:02:04,000
Kāng-khoán ê koan-liām, khài-liām, tùi ha̍k-si̍p sī pang-chān

12
00:02:04,000 --> 00:02:11,000
Bô-kāng ê koan-liām, khài-liām, tùi ha̍k-si̍p sī chó͘-gāi

13
00:02:11,000 --> 00:02:17,000
Chhiáⁿ chiām-sî chiong lí ê khòaⁿ-hoat khǹg chi̍t-piⁿ

14
00:02:17,000 --> 00:02:23,000
Tán Tâi-oân-jī o̍h liáu-āu chiah chò pí-kàu

15
00:02:23,000 --> 00:02:33,000
"hotsys-haksys" Tâi-gí-bûn hē-thóng tán lí lâi siá Tâi-gí-bûn

16
00:02:33,000 --> 00:02:44,000
Tâi-gí siaⁿ-ūn tùi Hôa-gí siaⁿ-ūn

17
00:02:44,000 --> 00:02:48,000
I ê hō-im kāng-khoán

18
00:02:48,000 --> 00:02:56,000
Sī iû siaⁿ-bó, siaⁿ-tiāu, kap ūn-bó chit saⁿ pō͘-hūn cho͘-ha̍p khí-lâi

19
00:02:56,000 --> 00:03:14,000
Chhin-chhiūⁿ Hôa-gí:

20
00:03:14,000 --> 00:03:21,000
Tâi-gí: pa, pá, pà, pah

21
00:03:21,000 --> 00:03:28,000
pâ, pā, pa̍h

22
00:03:28,000 --> 00:03:31,000
pa, pá, pà, pah

23
00:03:31,000 --> 00:03:40,000
pâ, pá, pà

24
00:03:40,000 --> 00:03:45,000
pa, pá, pà, pah

25
00:03:45,000 --> 00:03:52,000
pâ, pā, pa̍h

26
00:03:52,000 --> 00:04:04,000
Tâi-gí ū peh ê siaⁿ-tiāu, phīⁿ-im, ji̍p-siaⁿ, piàn-tiāu téng-téng

27
00:04:04,000 --> 00:04:14,000
Tâi-gí siaⁿ-ūn pí Hôa-gí khah cheng-bi̍t, só͘-í tong-jiân pí-kàu khah pháiⁿ o̍h

28
00:04:14,000 --> 00:04:19,000
Tâi-gí bô kńg-chi̍h-im

29
00:04:19,000 --> 00:04:26,000
Tâi-gí ū chin-chē ōe, bô-hoat-tō͘ iōng Hàn-jī lâi piáu-ta̍t
